About me

My name is Saltanat

Facts:

Fun fact:

Web development
Creation of sites of varying complexity (landing page, online store, catalog, CMS WordPress). High download speed. Content management
Application development
Creation of web applications (SPA). As well as the creation components for applications
UI/UX Design

Skills

What I use at work
HTML5
It is he who creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product
CSS3
This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
SASS
A CSS preprocessor that allows you to create websites faster and better. It makes it much easier to support large projects
Bootstrap
The most popular websites building library. It increases the speed of websites development and its adaptation
Gulp
A task manager who takes care of routine tasks. With it, it is easy to quickly optimize the site, minify files, images
Java Script
This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.
Jquery
The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product for your purposes
GitHub
The largest web service for hosting web projects and their joint development.
